concept.definition: The application acts as a client for this resource.
The application acts as a server for this resource.

description: The mode of a RESTful conformance statement.
name: RestfulConformanceMode

text.div:
RestfulConformanceMode

The mode of a RESTful conformance statement.

This value set has an inline code system http://hl7.org/fhir/restful-conformance-mode, which defines the following codes:

CodeDisplayDefinition
client ClientThe application acts as a client for this resource.
server ServerThe application acts as a server for this resource.
